text: qal alsaharat lfrewn: ln nfdlk, fntyek, wanatabie dynk, ealaa ma ja'ana bih musaa min albayinat aldalt ealaa sdqh wwjwb mtabeth wtaet rbh, walan nufaddil rbwbytk almzewmt ealaa rbwbyt allh aladhi khlqna, fafel ma 'ant faeil bna, 'iinama sltank fi hadhih alhayat aldnya, wama tafealuh bna, ma hu 'iilaa eadhab mnth banthayha
